title: Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister for Social Protection) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister social protection) order 2023

title: Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. Pauric McPhillips, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Pauric McPhillips, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Social Protection, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to the Minister for Social Protection, with effect from 17 December
text_norm: 2 pauric mcphillips particular whose address deposited office department social protection appointed special adviser minister social protection effect 17 december

title: Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government,

2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

14 February, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th February, 2023.
